forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
